summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary of a witness, referred to as 'Victim-1', conducted on September 28, 2019. The witness describes being recruited by her sister to meet Jeffrey Epstein at age 16 in 1995/1996, subsequent trips to New York and New Mexico where she experienced inappropriate touching by Epstein, and the involvement of Ghislaine Maxwell in facilitating and participating in the abuse.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexually abusing the witness. He is described as a wealthy individual who offered to help with college, paid for travel, and engaged in inappropriate physical contact with the witness when she was 16.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as Epstein's girlfriend and a chaperone. She facilitated the witness's trip to New Mexico, instructed her to give Epstein a foot massage, gave her a nude/inappropriate massage, and was present during Epstein's inappropriate touching.

persons.name: Victim-1
persons.context: The primary witness being interviewed. She was 16 years old when first contacted by Epstein through her sister in late 1995. She describes inappropriate physical contact by Epstein and Maxwell during trips to New York and New Mexico.

persons.name: Sister-1
persons.context: The witness's older sister who worked for Jeffrey Epstein and introduced the witness to him. She told the witness that Epstein wanted to meet her and help with college.

persons.name: Benjamin Margulis
persons.context: Attorney present during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Vickie Ward
persons.context: A journalist for Vanity Fair whom the witness spoke with about her case in 2003.

persons.name: Mother-1
persons.context: The witness's mother. She spoke to Epstein on the phone prior to the New Mexico trip and drove the witness to the airport.

persons.name: Ex-Boyfriend-1
persons.context: The witness's then-boyfriend to whom she recounted the massage incident in New Mexico shortly after it happened.

connections.description: Described as being in a relationship and working together to recruit and abuse the witness. Maxwell facilitated access and participated in the abuse.
Epstein recruited the 16-year-old witness, paid for her travel, and engaged in inappropriate touching (holding hands, rubbing arm/leg) on multiple occasions.
Maxwell acted as a chaperone, instructed the witness to massage Epstein, and gave the witness an inappropriate massage where she was nude/exposed.
The witness's sister worked for Jeffrey Epstein, which is how the initial contact with the witness was made.
Sisters. The older sister introduced the younger sister (the witness) to Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein spoke to the witness's mother on the phone multiple times to arrange and gain permission for the witness's trip to New Mexico.

events.title: Initial Recruitment
events.description: The witness's sister tells her that Jeffrey Epstein is interested in meeting her and wants to fly her out to help with college. The witness is 16 years old.

events.title: First Trip to New York
events.description: The witness flies to New York after Christmas. She meets Epstein at his townhouse, goes to see Phantom of the Opera, and later to a movie where Epstein holds her hand and rubs her arm and leg inappropriately.

events.title: Trip to New Mexico Ranch
events.description: The witness travels to a ranch in New Mexico where Epstein and Maxwell are present. Events include being instructed to massage Epstein's feet, receiving an inappropriate massage from Maxwell, and Epstein getting into bed to 'cuddle' with her.

events.title: Interview with Vanity Fair
events.description: The witness speaks with journalist Vickie Ward from Vanity Fair about her experiences with Epstein and Maxwell.

events.title: First FBI Interview
events.description: The witness first speaks with the FBI about her case.

events.title: Scheduled Interview with New Mexico AG
events.description: The New Mexico State Attorney's office schedules an interview with the witness, which never happens.

events.title: FBI Interview
events.description: The witness is interviewed by the FBI at One Saint Andrews Plaza in New York, with her attorney Benjamin Margulis present.

locations: One Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York
Apartment in the west village, New York
keyFacts: The witness was 16 years old when first contacted by Jeffrey Epstein in late 1995 through her sister who worked for him.
During a trip to New Mexico in April 1996, Ghislaine Maxwell instructed the witness to give Epstein a foot massage and later gave the witness a massage where she was nude/exposed.
Epstein got into bed with the witness at the New Mexico ranch to 'cuddle,' and he inappropriately touched her during movies in both New York and New Mexico.
The witness's mother spoke directly with Epstein on the phone to arrange the New Mexico trip, which was presented as a student trip with Maxwell as a chaperone.
The witness is willing to testify in a potential case against Ghislaine Maxwell and has spoken to multiple media outlets and law enforcement over the years (2003, 2006, 2019).
